## Reinforcement Learning Research Intern for Game AI

**Please only apply if you will have the right to work in Switzerland without sponsorship for the duration of an internship in 2026.**

Sony AI invites passionate and innovative Ph.D. students to join us as Research Scientist Interns specializing in deep reinforcement learning (deep RL). We are dedicated to expanding the application of AI to enhance human creativity. This internship offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge research in the Game AI field.

Learn more about Sony AI here:

**Roles and Responsibilities:**

*   Conduct research using deep RL techniques within game AI contexts.
    
*   Explore novel algorithms and methodologies to address AI challenges in modern PlayStation games.
    
*   Develop code to support research endeavors, primarily using Python.
    
*   Prepare reports and deliver presentations for diverse audiences within the organization.
    
*   Collaborate closely with a multidisciplinary team of AI researchers and developers on ambitious demonstration projects.
    

**Required** **Qualifications and Skills:**

*   Currently pursuing a Ph.D. with a focus on reinforcement learning or possessing equivalent practical experience.
    
*   Proficiency in designing and troubleshooting neural networks.
    
*   Enthusiasm for integrating AI solutions into gaming applications.
    
*   Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey complex ideas to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
    

**Working Location & Duration**

*   Fully remote possible from Switzerland, Spain, UK, France, Germany, Sweden, and Italy (Hybrid opportunities in the Zurich office)
    
*   Flexible duration ranging from 3 to 6 months in 2026.
    

**Why Join Us** 

At Sony AI, we value diversity and welcome individuals from all backgrounds to contribute to our collaborative and inclusive work environment. We encourage applicants with a passion for AI and gaming to apply and bring their unique perspectives to our team.

**Your new office**:

Surrounded by Swiss Alps, the Schlieren office is at the doorstep of Zurich, which is consistently voted in top three best cities to live. The city benefits from a very rich ecosystem where prestigious universities, research institutes, companies and organizations collaborate for the development and design of next generation technologies. Our office is very well connected with public transports (train, tram, bus) and located in a very modern and bright building. We have several enjoyable break rooms as well as a terrace which we use for regular social team events or as a casual working area. Our team is unique and international, representing engineering and sales/marketing functions, which creates this unique and passionate Sony Swiss DNA.

**Life at Sony Research**:

Our **work environment** is diverse and motivated with an innovative open mindset. Sony AI is committed to building a **diverse team** of people with different characters, stories and skillsets because we know this drives **innovation and creativity**. Our commitment to nurturing a **friendly and supportive** place of work where everyone has a sense of **belonging and inclusion** creates an atmosphere of learning and **personal growth**. We focus on achieving healthy **work-life balance** for our teams, supported by **hybrid and flexible** **working**.

You will work on **exciting projects** at the cutting edge of AI that are in the realms of entertainment or for the betterment of society, and you will have access to the most **innovative technologies from across the Sony universe** and the opportunity to partner with Sony’s leading companies.

When projects are finished, we **publish** our work, and all our contributors are **recognised** on research pieces, at top-tier conferences, and in journals. You will also have access to **workshops** and **development programs** to expand your knowledge and skills. We want you to **drive your career**, find your direction and take authorship of your personal story at Sony AI, while enjoying the **security and the resource-rich environment** that comes with being part of a global corporation that has R&D in its DNA.

**Bring your uniqueness to Sony**:

We are passionate about creating a culture that promotes equity and cultivates inclusion, diversity, and belonging. We want employees with diverse backgrounds and perspectives that will stimulate innovation and have a direct impact on our creation of social value to fulfil Sony’s purpose – ‘to fill the world with emotion, through the power of creativity and technology’. We want you to bring your unique self to work and help shape our culture.

**Equal Opportunity**:

Sony Europe is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment regardless of race, colour, religion, gender, citizenship, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, medical condition, or any other protected characteristics.

**Disability Accommodation for Applicants to Sony Europe**

Sony Europe will provide reasonable accommodation for any qualified individuals with disabilities in the application process. For reasonable accommodation requests, please contact us by email at [AccommodationRequest@eu.sony.com]() or by mail to: Sony Europe B.V, Human Resources Department, the Heights, Brooklands, Surrey, KT13 0XW, UK. When contacting us please indicate the position you are applying for, and the accommodation required.
